periods.name: Today
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 4pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. North wind 3 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 4am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 52. Northeast wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Friday
periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7am, then showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could be severe. Cloudy. High near 71, with temperatures falling to around 69 in the afternoon. East northeast wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could be severe and produce heavy rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. South wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy, with a high near 64. Northwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy, with a low around 42. North wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 50. North wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Clear
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 35. Northwest wind 3 to 8 mph.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 59. West northwest wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 54. North northeast wind around 5 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 35. East southeast wind around 5 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Rain Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 1pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 59. South southeast wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday Night

periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 1am, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 45. South southwest wind around 9 mph.
